sourcesContent:
import moment from "moment-timezone"; export default function DisplayWeather(props) { const { info, forecast } = props; const d = new Date(); var tz = moment.tz.guess(); return ( <>
{" "}
{` ${moment(Date.now()) .tz("America/New_York") .format("MM-DD-YY")}`}
{` ${moment(Date.now()).tz({ tz }).format("HH:mm")}`} EST
{info.name}, {info.state}, {info.country}{" "}
{info.temp} °F
{info.weather}
{info.description}
Forecast
{forecast ? forecast.map((time) => ( <>
{moment .unix(time.dt) .tz("America/New_York") .format("MM-DD-YY")}
{moment .unix(time.dt) .tz("America/New_York") .format("HH:mm")}{" "} EST
{time.main.temp} °F
{time.weather[0].main}
{time.weather[0].description}
{" "}
)) : null}
); }
